Reviews.Content: stayed couple nights recently disappointed stay expecting deal quality extremely disappointing lobby modern funky looking shock arrival stayed 4 star standard barely close door walk stumbling bed extremely dark window overlooked 4 grey walls drop bathroom single rails towels etc broken fall wall touched shower poor water pressure weak temperature night air conditioning appeared fine woke morning incredible heat feel ill reception air conditioning experiencing blowing hot air instead cool air staff unapologetic issue simply advised air con heat excessive eventually transferred air con remained hot air conditioning poor standard stay hotel location hotel excellent earn 4 star rating disappointed stay staying

Reviews.Title: “Great location, but more like a 3 star.”
Reviews.Author: 1girlintheworld
Reviews.Content: location prime exploring staff interacted friendly helpful loved free bottles ice cold water mini bar tight squeeze european standards literally couldnt walk bed climb hey youre barcelona dont spend time except sleep real issue im interior quieter street drag bed onto sidewalk street noise unbearable weve traveling europe 4 months staying 4 star hotels hotel definitely didnt measure value location reason choose hotel btw waiting line speak front desk 2 guys front explaining robbed night front desk person admitted happened guys calm especially considering 800 euro watches electronics stolen front desk person nonchalantly told file police report furious lack concern lock valuables staying

Reviews.Content: reading bad reviews trip advisor nervous staying hotel extremely pleasant stay arrived midnight desk friendly helpful top floor 8th floor overlooking el barri gotic lovely balcony seating evening time location wise street via laietana perfect rambla nightlife pleasant five minute walk rambla traditional streets mile walk barceloneta beach experience street noise night walls little thin breakfast nice range pastries cereals various meats perfect day started little priced cheap rate included breakfast hotel close metro stop nice traditional restaurants hidden gem recommending hotel complain tv channels etc barcelona city break decent sleep clean modern didnt tv city watch tv provided fresh towels toiletries day thank confortel

Reviews.Content: hotel conveniently located cathedral town centre literally minute walk hotel clean spacious bathroom clean shower powerful computers reception helpful planning rest journey checked 530 am receptionist helpful time morning definitely return hotel barcelona
